sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
What number should be added to each of the numbers \(7 \), \(16 \), \(24 \), and \(31 \) to make them proportional.
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "$$\text{Lets suppose that the required number is $z $.

Since the numbers $7 + z $, $16 + z $, $24 + z $, $31 + z $ are in proportion}$$, we have
\[
	\frac{\input[s1v1]{} + z }{16 + z } = \frac{\input[s1v2]{} + z }{31 + z }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow (7 + z )(31 + z ) = (16 + z )(24 + z )
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 217 + z (\input[s2v1]{} ) + z ^2 = 384 + z (\input[s2v2]{} ) + z ^2
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z (38 - 40 ) = 384 - 217 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{384 - 217 }{38 - 40 }
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 3, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{\input[s3v2]{} }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{\input[s3v3]{} }{2 }
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [7, 24], "text": "$$\text{Four numbers are proportional when $a:b::c:d$, thus, using this result we get} \frac{7 + z }{16 + z } = \frac{24 + z }{31 + z }$$"}, {"data": [38, 40], "text": " Upon cross- multiplication and further simplification we get \[
	z = \frac{384 - 217 }{38 - 40 }
\]"}, {"data": [167, -2, -167], "text": "Further simplification will give us the result as \[z= \frac{-167 }{2 }\] "}]
